file.name: job-manager-oas.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Job Manager
  description: Job Manager
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://os4ml-jobmanager.os4ml.svc.cluster.local:8000'
paths:
  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/experiment":
    get:
      summary: 'Get all Experiments'
      operationId: getAllExperiments
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - experiment
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Success"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Experiment'
    post:
      summary: 'Create new Experiment'
      operationId: postExperiment
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - experiment
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Experiment'
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Resource created"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExperimentId'
  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/pipeline":
    get:
      summary: 'Get all pipelines'
      operationId: getAllPipelines
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - pipeline
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Success"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pipeline'
    post:
      summary: 'Create Pipeline'
      operationId: postPipeline
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - pipeline
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreatePipeline'
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Resource created"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PipelineId'
  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/run":
    get:
      summary: 'Get all pipeline runs'
      operationId: getAllRuns
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - run
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Success"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Run'
  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/run/{run_id}":
    get:
      summary: 'Get single pipeline run'
      operationId: getRun
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RunId'
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - run
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Success"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Run'
  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/experiment/{experiment_id}/pipeline/{pipeline_id}/run":
    post:
      summary: 'Create Run'
      operationId: postRun
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ExperimentId'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PipelineId'
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - run
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateRun'
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Resource created"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/RunId'

  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/template/{pipeline_template_name}":
    post:
      summary: "Convenience route to run a Pipeline Template directly"
      operationId: postTemplate
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PipelineTemplateName'
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - template
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RunParams'
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Resource created"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/RunId'

  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/solution/{solution_name}":
    get:
      summary: "Get a solution"
      operationId: getSolution
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/SolutionName'
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - solution
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Solution found"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Solution'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
    put:
      summary: "Update a Solution"
      operationId: putSolution
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/SolutionName'
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - solution
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Solution'
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Solution updated"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Solution'

  "/apis/v1beta1/jobmanager/solution":
    post:
      summary: "Create and deploy a Solution"
      operationId: postSolution
      tags:
        - jobmanager
        - solution
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Solution'
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Solution created"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/RunId'

components:
  schemas:
    ExperimentId:
      type: string
    PipelineId:
      type: string
    ArtifactId:
      type: string
    Experiment:
      description: Experiment Object
      type: object
      required:
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExperimentId'
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
    Pipeline:
      description: Pipeline Object
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - description
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PipelineId'
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
    CreatePipeline:
      description: Create Pipeline Object
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pipeline'
        - type: object
          required:
            - config_url
          properties:
            configUrl:
              type: string
    Metrics:
      description: Run Metrics
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        value:
          type: number
        format:
          type: string
    Run:
      description: Run Object
      type: object
      required:
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/RunId'
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        error:
          type: string
        metrics:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Metrics'
    CreateRun:
      description: Create Run Object
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        params:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/RunParams'
    RunParams:
      description: Default Parameters to start Run
      type: object
      properties:
        bucket:
          type: string
        fileName:
          type: string
        solutionName:
          type: string
    Error:
      required:
        - path
        - error
        - timestamp
        - message
        - status

  parameters:
    ExperimentId:
      name: ExperimentId
      in: path
      description: Id of Experiment
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExperimentId'
    PipelineId:
      name: PipelineId
      in: path
      description: Id of Pipeline
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/PipelineId'
    RunId:
      name: RunId
      in: path
      description: Id of Run
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/RunId'
    PipelineTemplateName:
      name: PipelineTemplateName
      in: path
      description: Name of the PipelineTemplate to run
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    SolutionName:
      name: SolutionName
      in: path
      description: Name of the Solution
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
  responses:
    Created:
      description: New resource created
    Deleted:
      description: The specified resource was deleted
    Updated:
      description: The specified resource was updated
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    RequestBodyMismatch:
      description: The provided request body has the wrong format
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    RequestBodyInvalid:
      description: The content of the request body is invalid
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: at 1:15: schemas: "Run": parse schema: property "id": at 1:2673: parse schema: resolve "./shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/RunId": external "./shared-oas.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
